creator: ggregory@seagullsw.com
text:
It seems that the FTP task is not in 1.4alpha builds!

Example:
13:55:25 C:\WBDevIm\ReposWrk\Build
>build-2_1Beta01.bat dist-zip-to-ftp.seagull.ie

13:55:25 C:\WBDevIm\ReposWrk\Build
>set SAVED_CP=C:\PROGRA~1\MQSeries\java\lib\COMIBM~2.JAR;C:\PROGRA~1\MQSeries\ja
va\lib\COMIBM~1.JAR;C:\PROGRA~1\MQSeries\java\lib\COMIBM~3.JAR;C:\PROGRA~1\MQSer
ies\tools\javaclnt\samples\en_us

13:55:25 C:\WBDevIm\ReposWrk\Build
>set CLASSPATH=C:\Apache\jakarta-ant-1.4alpha\lib\NetComponents.jar

13:55:25 C:\WBDevIm\ReposWrk\Build
>call ant.bat -buildfile build-2_1Beta01.xml dist-zip-to-ftp.seagull.ie
Buildfile: build-2_1Beta01.xml

dist-zip-to-ftp.seagull.ie:

BUILD FAILED

C:\WBDevIm\ReposWrk\Build\build-2_1Beta01.xml:2617: Could not create task of typ
e: ftp. Common solutions are to use taskdef to declare your task, or, if this is
 an optional task, to put the optional.jar in the lib directory of your ant inst
allation (ANT_HOME).

Total time: 2 seconds

The nightly builds are performed on a machine that doesn't have NetComponents
installed and therefore cannot build the ftp task.

In general, you cannot expect that nightly builds contain all optional tasks,
we provide a snapshot of optional.jar from time to time.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
